transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Ha sir please.
Executive: Ha Jugal sir baat kar rahe hai Mr. Champ se?
Customer: Ha ha bolie sir.
Executive: Ha sir aapka ek IndiaMART pe concern raise hua tha aapne IndiaMART ke customer care 966 number pe call kiya tha.
Customer: Maine ek requirement post ki thi mujhe mix zylene chahiye tha aur customer care se meri baat hui thi ke wo mujhe maine unko bola tha ki mujhe near by Vadodara ke jo bhi hai seller unka contact please list dijiye. To unhone mujhe Maharashtra, Delhi, Ahmedabad ka details de rahe hai usse kya matlab bana sir?
Executive: Thik hai aapko supplier ka details chahiye na koi product agar aapko kharidna hai to right?
Customer: Ha mujhe product kharidna hai to supplier ki details chahiye thi bolenge aapko whatsapp pe aa jayenge whatsapp pe aaya nahi mail pe aaya tha to mail pe bhi jo details aayi wo sab Maharashtra, Bombay ki aayi kya matlab banta hai sir? Customer jo bol raha hai wahi to na sir.
Executive: Thik hai ek kaam kariye please aapke aapke mobile ke andar aap google open kariye main ek site show karta hu jaha pe aap location wise sare suppliers ki list dekh payenge ki konse product ka konsa supplier kis location se belong kar raha hai location wise product wise aap supplier ki puri list aap dekh paoge IndiaMART pe to open karenge please ek baar google.
Customer: Google mein kya hai chrome ya phir map? IndiaMART open karu na pehle?
Executive: No no no google chrome open kar dijiye google chrome.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Waha pe apne product ka ek baar mujhe naam bataiye sir kya product hai?
Customer: Mix zylene.
Executive: Mix drylene?
Customer: Ha zylene.
Executive: Ek baar please spell karenge mujhe mix mix zylene drylene.
Customer: Aap ek baar google chrome pe jaake wo search kariye sir aap apna product ka naam enter kariye to pehle uske baad location mein daliega in aapki konsi location chahiye wo location daliye sir google chrome pe jaake.
Executive: Aapka voice clear nahi aaya product ka naam agar dobara repeat karenge to main apni side se bhi search kar paunga.
Customer: Maine dal diya hai google map pe thik hai.
Executive: Okay google mein google map pe nahi sir google chrome pe.
Customer: Ha google chrome pe sorry google kya dala sir aapne?
Customer: Aur mix zylene near me.
Executive: Ha okay then aap jaise search karenge IndiaMART ki ek site dikhegi dir.indiamart.com sir.
Customer: Ha IndiaMART ki dikhi.
Executive: Thik hai aap us site ko us par open kariye to aapko upar mein location dikh rahi hogi sare suppliers ki list aapke samne open hui hogi.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Thik hai to aap upar mein di hui location ko change karke location wise sare suppliers ki list yaha se check kar sakte hai sir. Yaha pe dekhiyega jo sabse upar supplier dikh raha hai waise koi bhi supplier ka naam dikha hoga supplier ke naam ke niche uski location likhi hogi ki supplier kaha se belong kar raha hai. Agar waha pe jaise aapne jo location laga rakhi hai kuch supplier ke niche likhega deals in this location karke to matlab hai ki wo bahar ki location ka supplier hai but aapki location pe wo deal karta hai matlab product aapki location pe wo de sakta hai sir.
Customer: Wo to baat sahi hai but sir mujhe kya hai na directly jaake customer se kharidna hai ye material isiliye main Vadodara hi aaya hu isiliye main bol raha hu ki mujhe near by Vadodara ke chahiye. Sir aap phir agar customer bol raha hai ki aapko yahi bhejna hai to phir aap dusra product kyu bhej rahe ho mujhe ye pata nahi chal raha hai.
Executive: Ha main samajh gaya.
Customer: Nahi ye baat hai na dekho main aapke waha IndiaMART ka maine trust seal pack liya hua hai sir. Ha aur dikkat mujhe bhi aa rahi hai kya mujhe sell nahi mil raha hai thik hai aap agar aisa hi kaam karoge to sell kaise badhega? Customer kya hota hai pak jata hai isse.
Executive: Ha.
Customer: Kabhi kabhi customer free nahi hota hai wo seedha point ki baat karta hai aur aap usko ghuma fira ke doge to customer nahi sell hona hai sir.
Executive: Sahi baat hai sir abhi jo maine aapko cheez explain ki maybe aapko ye problem aa rahi hai thik hai sir to aap ye bhi problem thik karwaiye.
Executive: Bilkul aur ye jo abhi discussion ho raha tha supplier ko sir find karne ka maybe jo maine aapko link bataya jis tarike se guide kiya aapko ki is tarike se find karenge to apne is location ke location wise supplier ki list open ho jayegi to maybe aapka ye concern clear hua hoga sir ki aapko supplier ka list dikha raha hoga mobile number ke sath mein.
Customer: Ha dikha raha hai. Hai na to aap waha se directly supplier ko samne wale ko call bhi kar sakte ho sir aur sath hi sath aapko location ko switch bhi kar sakte ho suppose agar aap Vadodara mein abhi ho nazdiki agar koi dusre location ka bhi supplier dekhoge to supplier ki us location ko select karne ke baad usi location ke supplier ki list open ho jayegi aapke samne.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Okay sir.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Thik hai abhi main aapka ek concern aapne 966 number pe call kiya tha to hamare yaha pe concern raise ho gaya tha to agar aap mere diye hue solution se satisfied hai to aapke pass ek mail aayega please aap usko positive feedback dijiyega.
Executive: Okay sir.
Customer: Ha thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants nearby Vadodara sellers list.

- Dissatisfied with irrelevant supplier details.

- Expresses concern about declining sales.



Resolution:

- Guided to find location-wise suppliers list.

- Explained how to switch locations for suppliers.

- Asked to provide positive feedback via email.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will receive a feedback email.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- suppliers, location, indiamart, feedback, trustseal
